    CMP3\Source

    Interface SourceInterface

    All Known Implementing Classes:

    SourceAbstract
    public interface SourceInterface

    A * does following:
    - fetching the data from the source (db, file from filesystem, http, ...) - detecting the content type (see ContentType) - might be set by configuration - processes content - returns content object
